subject: [Radiance-general] [off-list] Re: pcond: error reading from pfilprocess in fovimage
body:
--------
WARNING: At least one of the links in the message below goes to an .exe file,
which could be malicious. To learn how to protect yourself, please go here:

--------

Super great, I'll give it a go and hope it makes it into the new distros/builds.
I sent the "un-pfilt-able" image to Greg and will let you know what he makes of
it.
best
m
